ygData.subject: Come on, body...... and a new power
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois sat in the emissary, trying to make sense of these new feelings. Since becoming the emissairy for The Matrix, he has been feeling some knew things deep

Subject: Come on, body...... and a new power
Message-ID: <8m5e01+p5lq@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0

From: minime_316@...

Vulois sat in the emissary, trying to make sense of these new 
feelings. Since becoming the emissairy for The Matrix, he has been 
feeling some knew things deep within him. Right now he is learning a 
hrad one: How to deal with hearing and seeing others conversations. 
He did not control it. He did not summon it. But than it was there. 
At first he could only get a few words out of it, and not recognize 
the figures. But win the coversation started circulating around 
someone imparticular, it began to be clearer. He saw it was Battera 
and some Maximal. He carefully walked over to the computer banks to 
check who this is. He still could not believe he could be seeing 
things here and in the Cybertronian Fire. The computer said he was a 
Mximal named Red. No, wait, Rex. Both visions were blurry. Vulois 
heard a specific line come from Rex.

"So a "very special" Pred is holding a peace conference, and all the 
leaders are supposed to be there. I assume all his assitants are 
Preds. Sounds like an ambush to me"(Sorry if this isn't exactly 
right, I forgot to copy and paste.)

Vulois wanted to send Rex a message, but didn't want tyo risk using 
his devices when his body was like this.

So then go to him.

Wha? Who said that?, Vulois thought

I did

Who are you?

I have no name really. I am the voice of The Matrix, but NOT The 
Matrix. I am your conscience, but not YOUR conscience. I was your 
conscience, but now I relay the things The Matrix wants you to know. 
You may call me Convix.

Okay, so what does The Matrix want me to do?

Go to Rex. When you are in this state, your mind can enter his. You 
can show him things. Make him believe in Battera. I will take you 
there.

Suddenly it felt like Vulois had been sucked out of his body, which, 
in a way, had. In seconds he was connected to Rex. He could read this 
thoughts, feel his pain, and know everything about him. He wondered 
if Rex had noticed him yet, but he was going to come forward.

"Rex? Don't bother to look around, you won't find me. I am Vulois, to 
you the so called "Very Special" Pred. I want you to know that I am 
not a Pred. I used to be, and regret it. I now distest their 
lifestyle. But now I am going to change it. Must change it. I, along 
with my three chosen ones, must bring peace in order to save 
Cybertron. Look at this.

Vulois made a picture of Cybertron for Rex. It was engulfed in a 
Nebula. Destruction struck everywhere. Than, all the bots started 
attacking each other. Maxi on Pred. Pred on Maxi. Maxi on Maxi. Pred 
on Pred. Than Vulois explained.

"This storm turned on a programming hidden deep inside, no one evr 
found it. It brings us back to the way we were, mindless killing 
machines. Every bot has it....except for the ones in this war. When 
we took Organic forms, it forever made us....alive, would be a good 
enough term. It deactivated the programming. Keep watching."

A large ship comes in and lands on Cybertron. It opens, and out step 
Vulois, Battera, Soundwave and Cybershark. With them they have 
leashes, with various animals. Behind them, the reast of the Neo 
Beast Wars bots run out. They run up to bots, and activate their 
internal DNA Scanners. They scanned the animals and took their shape, 
and all peace was restored. Vulois continued.

"So you see, it's imperative that I make peace with everyone. Because 
if we don't go back, Cybertron will die. And it's bad mouth rasists 
like you who keeps me from acheiving this goal. You may ask why do I 
need everyone. Well, it's because if I don't, than someone will try 
to stop me when we leave. And they will succeed, no matter what. I 
saw it in a vision. I hope I have answered all your questions. I will 
leave you now. Please revise your thinking.

Vulois went back to his body.

Brix/Octociz

Octociz came forward, and looked at all the life in this woodland 
area. Beavers, and bears, and foxes and all sorts of things. He 
wondered which would be his form, now that his Octopus was gone. He 
contacted Ramulus.

"Hey buddy, hurry up!  I need to get out, and fast!"

He sat back and went to sleep. Brix already was.
